column4: does anybody know how to use flash memory as part of system memory, like vista does?  i gotta admit, that's pretty amazing that microsoft came up with a measly one new feature to the software industry
how much would that gain you? where does it say vista is doing that?
i don't recall the site, but look it up if you'd like
sorry but as you can see from peoples responses that doesnt make sense, may have read wrong or the site was bs
